title: Raw Chocolate Brownies

ingredients.content: 190 g almond pulp (use leftover pulp from almond milk)

preparations.content: Place all ingredients in mixing bowl and grind <b>15 sec/speed 10<b>. Roll into 20 walnut sized balls then place in fridge to set for 20 minutes..
Enjoy raw chocolate brownies with a mug of black coffee or tea.

hintsAndTricks: Recipe developed by Jenny Tschiesche BSc(Hons) Dip(ION) FdSc BANT. For more information see www.jennytschiesche.com.
Substitute vanilla extract with equal quantities of orange or coffee extract.
